Download Topicmodels for GermaParl.

germaparl_download_lda.Rd

A set of LDA topicmodels is deposited at a Amazon S3 webspace, for a number of topics between 100 and 500. The function germaparl_download_lda to download the *.rds-file. It will be stored in the extdata/topicmodels/ subdirectory of the installed GermaParl package.

germaparl_download_lda(k = c(100L, 150L, 175L, 200L, 225L, 250L, 275L, 300L,
  350L, 400L, 450L, 500L),
  rds_file = sprintf("germaparl_lda_speeches_%d.rds", k),
  webdir = "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/polmine/corpora/cwb/germaparl")

Arguments

k

The number of topics of the topicmodel.
rds_file

filename of the RData file
webdir

The web location.

Examples

topicmodel_dir <- system.file(package = "GermaParl", "extdata", "topicmodels")
lda_files <- Sys.glob(paths = sprintf("%s/lda_germaparl_speeches_*.rds", topicmodel_dir))
if (length(lda_files) > 0  && requireNamespace("topicmodels")){
  lda <- readRDS(lda_files[1])
  lda_terms <- terms(lda, 50)
}
